Title: Le Jour Time Co. Swiss Made 17 Jewels "Kent" Incabloc Open Face Pocket Watch
Description: Please examine photos. They are THIS item and are part of the description. I do not use stock photos or photos of other people’s items.This is a Swiss made open face pocket watch by Le Jour Time Co. in their "Kent" 17 Jewels model with Incabloc shock resistance. The works are also marked with a P in a Shield with 330 and 6 below plus MWS. The watch wants to work but does not tick consistently. The hands can be adjusted but there is some skipping. Le Jour made chronographs in the 70s and 80s. This appears to be a 1960s era product. Get this item with FREE SHIPPING and tracking in the USA. Significant flaws not depicted in the photos are described here-with, minor flaws and normal wear are not. Unless the item is described as new, assume there will be minor flaws or wear commensurate with a used item of given age. If Buyer is at all concerned about the time it takes for delivery, please consider the option of paying extra for Priority Mail. Positive Feedback is greatly appreciated and shall be given in return. If Buyer intends to leave negative feedback of any kind, please contact me first so I can try to resolve the issue. Please ask any questions you might have before bidding. I will be happy to answer questions about a particular item to the best of my ability. I will not be able to issue discounts after the invoice is paid as a result of E-BAY requirements. Please contact me if you have any questions. Thank You.
ConditionDescription: Pre-Owned. Please see photos and description.
